page.title: 02SUPERNATURAL
page.content: An example of this is the Kirklandpark Hotel.When the building was first constructed it was inhabited by a wealthy owner;unfortunately it was burned down by an unexplained fire.It was rebuilt and nowadays is a Hotel and Recording Studio.Previous occupants who died in one of several fires have been spotted in their ghostly apparitions,they are however reputed to be harmless.Some of the ghosts have been "identified" as a gardener,gamekeeper,child in Victorian costume and a dark haired lady with manly features.They have been seen both in the building and in the surrounding grounds. A woman was walled up in the local castle for some misdemeanour and haunts it.Her skeleton was recovered by workmen a century or so ago,but of course all castles have this story.
